discord-desc: The description used for the Discord extension
discord-userlinks:
Used for display of the user links. Parameters
* $1 - User page link
* $2 - discord-talk
* $3 - discord-contribs
discord-revisionlinks:
Used for display of revision links. Parameters
* $1 - discord-diff
* $2 - discord-minor
* $3 - discord-size
discord-talk: Used as the text for $2 in discord-userlinks
discord-contribs: Used as the text for $3 in discord-userlinks
discord-diff: Used as the text for $1 in discord-revisionlinks
discord-minor: Used as the text for $2 in discord-revisionlinks
discord-size:
Used as the text for $3 in discord-revisionlinks. Parameters
* $1 - Calculated revision size diff
discord-edit:
Message sent to Discord for when a page edit is made. Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks
* $2 - Page link
* $3 - discord-revisionlinks
* $4 - Summary (always surrounded in tildes)
discord-create:
Message sent to Discord for when a page creation is made. Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks
* $2 - Page link
* $3 - discord-revisionlinks
* $4 - Summary (always surrounded in tildes)
discord-articledelete:
Message sent to Discord when a page is deleted. Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks
* $2 - Page link
* $3 - Reason (always surrounded in tildes)
* $4 - Number of revisions deleted
discord-undeleterev: Used as the text for $2 in discord-articleundelete if revisions are being undeleted rather than a page
discord-articleundelete:
Message sent to Discord when pages/revisions are undeleted. Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks
* $2 - discord-undeleterev
* $3 - Page link
* $4 - Comment (always surrounded in tildes)
discord-revvisibility:
Message sent to Discord when the visibility of revisions is changed. Parameters:
$1 - discord-userlinks
* $2 - Number of revisions
* $3 - Page link
discord-articleprotect:
Message sent to Discord when an article's protection is changed. Parameters:
$1 - discord-userlinks
* $2 - Page link
* $3 - Reason (always surrounded in tildes)
* $4 - Protection settings
discord-titlemove:
Message sent to Discord when an article is moved. Parameters:
$1 - discord-userlinks
$2 - Old page link
$3 - New page link
$4 - Reason (always surrounded in tildes)
$5 - discord-revisionlinks
discord-localusercreated:
Message sent to Discord when a user registers. Parameters:
$1 - discord-userlinks
discord-blocktimeformat: The formatting used in the date() function for displaying the time a user is blocked for.
discord-blockipcomplete:
Message sent to Discord when a user is blocked. Parameters:
$1 - discord-userlinks (performer)
$2 - discord-userlinks (target)
$3 - Reason (always surrounded in tildes)
$4 - Expiry text (using discord-blocktimeformat)
discord-unblockusercomplete:
Message sent to Discord when a user is unblocked. Parameters:
$1 - discord-userlinks (performer)
$2 - discord-userlinks (target)
discord-usergroupschanged:
Message sent to Discord when a user's group is changed. Parameters:
$1 - discord-userlinks (performer)
$2 -discord-userlinks (target)
$3 - Reason (always surrounded in tildes)
$4 - Added rights (prepended by +)
$5 - Removed rights (prepended by -)
discord-uploadnewver: Used as the text for $2 in discord-uploadcomplete
discord-uploadcomplete:
Message sent to Discord when an upload is made. Parameters:
$1 - discord-userlinks
$2 - discord-uploadnewver
$3 - File link
$4 - Comment (always surrounded in tildes)
$5 - Size (formatted as KB/MB/GB)
$6 - File width
$7 - File height
$8 - File MIME type
discord-filedeletecomplete:
Message sent to Discord when a file version is deleted (not an entire file). Parameters:
$1 - discord-userlinks
$2 - File link
$3 - Comment (always surrounded in tildes)
discord-fileundeletecomplete:
Message sent to Discord when a file version is restored (not an entire file). Parameters:
$1 - discord-userlinks
$2 - File link
$3 - Comment (always surrounded in tildes)
discord-afterimportpage:
Message sent to Discord when a page is imported. Parameters:
$1 - discord-userlinks
$2 - Page link
$3 - Number of revisions in XML file
$4 - Number of revisions successfully imported
discord-timestampformat: The formatting used in the gmtime() function for displaying the time an event happened in UTC.
discord-articlemergecomplete:
Message sent to Discord when page histories are merged. Parameters:
$1 - discord-userlinks
$2 - Target link
$3 - Destination link
discord-approvedrevsrevisionapproved:
Message sent to Discord when a revision is approved (Approved Revs extension). Parameters:
$1 - discord-userlinks (admin user)
$2 - Target link
$3 - Revision link or ID
$4 - discord-userlinks (revision author) or ID
discord-approvedrevsrevisionunapproved:
Message sent to Discord when a revision is unapproved (Approved Revs extension). Parameters:
$1 - discord-userlinks (admin user)
$2 - Target link
discord-approvedrevsfilerevisionapproved:
Message sent to Discord when a file revision is approved (Approved Revs extension). Parameters:
$1 - discord-userlinks (admin user)
$2 - Target link
$3 - SHA of uploaded file
$4 - discord-userlinks (revision author)
discord-approvedrevsfilerevisionunapprov:
Message sent to Discord when a file revision is unapproved (Approved Revs extension). Parameters:
$1 - discord-userlinks (admin user)
$2 - Target link
